source_description: Connection string to your MySql database
target_description: Connection string to your PostgreSql database
temporary_directory_description: Path to temporary directory, that will be used during migration only.
When the migration will be accomplished the 'temporary_directory' will be deleted.
encoding_description: Encoding type of your PostgreSql database.
If not supplied, then UTF-8 will be used as a default.
write_error_log_to_description: Path to a text file, which will be created and filled with error logs only.
If not supplied, then no 'error_log' file will be created.
write_summary_report_to_description: Path to a text file, which will be created and filled with a summary report, a grid of migration statistics.
If not supplied, then no 'summary_report' file will be created.
write_common_log_to_description: Path to a text file, which will be created and filled with logs and error messages during migration.
If not supplied, then no 'common_log' file will be created.
